_comment: BPDA + EOT PGD ATTACK AGAINST EBM PURIFICATION DEFENSE
===== EXPERIMENT PARAMETERS =====
type of data for experiment (cifar10, cifar100, svhn)
name for experiment folder
number of images for each attack batch
first batch from test set to attack
final batch from test set to attack
use random images for subset or not
seed for random numbers
===== CLASSIFIER AND ENERGY NETWORKS =====
location of clf trained weights
location of ebm trained weights
===== ATTACK PARAMETERS =====
l_p norm for attack (use l_inf or l_2)
number of attack steps
l_p ball size of image perturbation for pixels in [0, 255]
gradient step size in l_p norm of adv. update for pixels in [0, 255]
use random start in l_p ball around images (otherwise start at original image)
use BPDA + EOT attack against purifier and classifier or get attack grads from classifier only
number parallel samples for EOT attack (==1 for non-eot attack, >1 for eot attack)
method for averaging the output of parallel chains for EOT attack
===== PURIFICATION PARAMETERS =====
number of purification steps (0 for attack vs. classifier only)
langevin noise magnitude
number of parallel purification trials for verifying successful attacks with EOT defense
method for averaging the output of parallel chains for EOT defense prediction
===== LOGGING =====
frequency of printing attack results
